abstracts.cdata!:
The Eligibility Report for the Itaparica
            Resettlement and Irrigation Project in Brazil retraces the
            Request for Inspection and the Management Response,
            including detailed reports of each complaint to be
            investigated.  The Eligibility Report recommends that an
            investigation into the project be organized.  The
            investigation shows that there have been adverse effects on
            the resettled people and that Bank policies may have been
            violated.  While the recommendations are valid, the
            cooperation of all the organizations involved hinders the
            resolution of the complaints.
